fit module

Fitting Model Class.

Contains class for specific diseases that inherit from the class FitModel. Inherits from the VectorBorneDiseaseModel class.

class fit.FitModel(config_file, disease_name, param_dict=None)

Bases: vbdm.VectorBorneDiseaseModel

Defines a general fitting procedure.

Inherits from VectorBorneDiseaseModel.

Attributes:

config_dict: All configurations read in from config file.

params: ODE system parameters.

initial_states: initial states for population sizes.

fit_params: parameter names and range values to fit.

fit_data: list of csvs to fit the model to.

error_check_compartment_names()

check if fitting compartment names match an initial state name

check if fitting compartment names matches a column name in corresponding fitting data

error_check_data_and_output_length()

check if the number of rows in fitting data sets will match the number of rows in the corresponding model output check if the fitting data has any NAs

error_check_resolution()

check if resolution in configuration file is 1 for a daily run

check if all fitting data resolutions are listed as either daily or weekly

fit_constants()
fit_objective(params_fit)
fit_run_model(params_fit)
abstract model_func(t, y)
classmethod param_dict(config_file, disease_name, param_dict)

Inherit vbdm param_dict class method

save_fit_output(disease_name)
